TeamSize.definition: Total number of workers in the team

ShiftDuration.definition: Duration of the flash sale shift in hours

MaxAverageTravelFatigue.definition: Maximum allowed average travel fatigue in miles per day

RelayRunnerSpeed.definition: Speed of Relay Runner in miles per hour

RelayRunnerPackageRate.definition: Package processing rate for Relay Runner in packages per hour

ZonePickerSpeed.definition: Speed of Zone Picker in miles per hour

ZonePickerPackageRate.definition: Package processing rate for Zone Picker in packages per hour

RestockSpecialistSpeed.definition: Speed of Restock Specialist in miles per hour

RestockSpecialistPackageRate.definition: Package processing rate for Restock Specialist in packages per hour

NonRelayWorkers.definition: Number of workers to be assigned as Zone Pickers or Restock Specialists
